reviewText: I dearly wish Disney's corporate name were not now associated with Miyazaki's work, but oh well ... This is a terrific semi-autobiographical story meant more for older children and adults. Miyazaki's last before he announced his retirement from Ghibli (of course, he has more films coming out), this is so obviously a labor of great love. Realistic in theme, the fantastical elements are the main character's dreams, which inspire his work.
